channel.title: LSP - Lagex Scripting Package! - Inlcudes Form Editor and Code Editor
channel.description:
Ok. Remember LSC? Well. I Have been working on a package.
And i have completed it.
Basicly. its a Form Editor (LFE(Lagex Form Editor)) and LSC (Lagex Script Control)
See Screenshot: [img]http://img220.imageshack.us/img220/2949/scrnsp8.png[/img]
Note: I Know its not that attractive. but hey. its only in beta ;)
When you save it it outputs as a .lfrm (lagex form) file.
This file contains all of the information that is created when you make your form.
This can only be opened [b]WITH[/b] The Form editor. It cannot be double clicked ;)
[i]Did you know:[/i] You can RightClick on the .lfrm file and open it with notepad? Knowing this you can post your forms here in text! When you have posted it. You can get other people to C+P it into another notepad document and save it as .lfrm so you can share your cool apps?
Upcomming Features:
I Will add more functions for the Form Editor. I Will iron out any bugs. I Will eventually make this a shareware program. (when i have fully completed the app.) I Will make it so you can save your form and your code as an .exe
[center][url=http://www.megaupload.com/?d=XSE76373]DOWNLOAD (48KB)[/url][/center]
~Wonderguy6 Lagex.net
[br][size=1]Posted on: February 25, 2007, 06:46:50 PM[/size][hr]forgot, im working on my own language in VB6. its easier than i though. :P

item.title: LSP - Lagex Scripting Package! - Inlcudes Form Editor and Code Editor
item.dc:creator: @terrankiller terrankiller
item.description:
@terrankiller wrote:


'Put this in a Public Module:

Public Const 1_dum_taco = "Gay"

Public Function Terrankilleris1337() As Boolean

   If 1_dum_taco = "Gay" then

      Terrankilleris1337 = True

   Else

      Terrankilleris1337 = True

   End if

End Function

'Example usage using the Form_Load procedure:

Private Sub Form_Load()

   Form1.Visible = Terrankilleris1337

   MsgBox "VIRUS", vbcritical, "OH NOES!"

End Sub

What have I done? Everything :). I just developed VB6 functions that you all use ;).

Read full topic
